Body therapy is a type of holistic healing that uses various techniques to improve the health and well-being of the body. Body therapy is used to treat a variety of conditions, including chronic pain, [stress](https://mantracare.org/counseling/stress/), [anxiety](https://mantracare.org/counseling/anxiety/), and [depression](https://mantracare.org/counseling/depression/).
